io.micronaut.core.attr

Interface MutableAttributeHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeHolder
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationContext, BeanContext, HttpMessage<B>, HttpRequest<B>, HttpResponse<B>, InvocationContext<T,R>, MethodInvocationContext<T,R>, MutableHttpMessage<B>, MutableHttpRequest<B>, MutableHttpResponse<B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNettyHttpRequest, DefaultApplicationContext, DefaultBeanContext, FullHttpRequest, FullNettyClientHttpResponse, HttpMessageWrapper, HttpRequestWrapper, HttpResponseWrapper, InterceptorChain, MethodInterceptorChain, NettyHttpRequest, NettyMutableHttpResponse, SimpleHttpRequest

    public interface MutableAttributeHolder
extends AttributeHolder
    An interface for types that support mutating attributes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      MutableConvertibleValues<java.lang.Object> getAttributes()
      Overrides the default AttributeHolder.getAttributes() method to return a mutable object.
      default <T> java.util.Optional<T> removeAttribute(java.lang.CharSequence name, java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Remove an attribute.
      default MutableAttributeHolder setAttribute(java.lang.CharSequence name, java.lang.Object value)
